trans-unit.source: Manipulates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that has been applied by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> action.
trans-unit.target: Bewerkt een <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> die is toegepast door een <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> in te grijpen.

trans-unit.source: ## Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a ControllableStoryboardAction object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ##Onderbreken, hervatten, stoppen of anders besturingselement een Storyboard interactief worden onderbreken, hervatten of anders beheren een <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interactief, stel de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>eigenschap van de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>en gebruiken van een object ControllableStoryboardAction (zoals <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) om dit te beheren door te verwijzen naar de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Als de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>van <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>is niet opgegeven, de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>niet interactief worden beheerd nadat deze is gestart.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Zie [hoe: gebeurtenistriggers gebruiken om te bepalen een Storyboard na het starten](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) voor meer informatie.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>van de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> die begon het <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> u wilt beheren interactief.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>van de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> die begon het <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> u wilt beheren interactief.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: De standaardwaarde is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
